NSIS 可下载 HM NIS Edit 插件，进行图形化创建脚本。

示例：

```nsis
; Script generated by the HM NIS Edit Script Wizard.

; HM NIS Edit Wizard helper defines
!define PRODUCT_NAME "畅写文档"
; !define PRODUCT_VERSION "1.0.1"
!define PRODUCT_PUBLISHER "UnionTech, Inc."
!define PRODUCT_WEB_SITE "http://91changxie.com/"
!define PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY "Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\App Paths\changxie.exe"
!define PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY "Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\${PRODUCT_NAME}"
!define PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY "HKLM"
!define COMPANY_NAME "UnionTech"
!define APP "src\changxie.exe"

; MUI 1.67 compatible ------
!include "MUI2.nsh"

; MUI Settings
; install uninstall ico
!define MUI_ABORTWARNING
!define MUI_ICON "logo.ico"
!define MUI_UNICON "logo.ico"

; !define MUI_HEADERIMAGE
; !define MUI_HEADERIMAGE_BITMAP "logohead.bmp"
!define MUI_WELCOMEFINISHPAGE_BITMAP "banner_min.bmp"


; Welcome page
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_WELCOME
; License page
; !define MUI_LICENSEPAGE_RADIOBUTTONS
!define MUI_LICENSEPAGE_CHECKBOX
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_LICENSE "Licence.txt"
; Directory page
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_DIRECTORY
; Instfiles page
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_INSTFILES
; Finish page
!define MUI_FINISHPAGE_RUN "$INSTDIR\changxie.exe"
!insertmacro MUI_PAGE_FINISH

; Uninstaller pages
!insertmacro MUI_UNPAGE_INSTFILES

; Language files
!insertmacro MUI_LANGUAGE "SimpChinese"

; MUI end ------

;--------------------------------
;Version Information
!getdllversion "${APP}" ver 
!define PRODUCT_VERSION "${ver1}.${ver2}.${ver3}.${ver4}" 
VIProductVersion "${PRODUCT_VERSION}" 
VIAddVersionKey "FileVersion" "${PRODUCT_VERSION}" 
VIAddVersionKey "ProductVersion" "${PRODUCT_VERSION}" 
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "ProductName" "${PRODUCT_NAME}"
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "CompanyName" "${COMPANY_NAME}"
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "LegalCopyright" "Copyright UnionTech company"
; VIAddVersionKey "LegalCopyright" "http://nsis.sf.net/License"
VIAddVersionKey /LANG=2052 "FileDescription" "${PRODUCT_NAME}"
;--------------------------------

;--------------------------------
Name "${PRODUCT_NAME}"
OutFile "${PRODUCT_NAME}_${PRODUCT_VERSION}_x64.exe"
InstallDir "$PROGRAMFILES64\畅写文档"
InstallDirRegKey HKLM "${PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY}" ""
ShowInstDetails show
ShowUnInstDetails show
;--------------------------------

Section "MainSection" SEC01
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  SetOverwrite try
  File "src\changxie.exe"
  CreateDirectory "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档"
  CreateShortCut "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\畅写文档.lnk" "$INSTDIR\changxie.exe"
  CreateShortCut "$DESKTOP\畅写文档.lnk" "$INSTDIR\changxie.exe"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\iconengines"
  File "src\iconengines\qsvgicon.dll"

  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\bearer"
  File "src\bearer\qgenericbearer.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\imageformats"
  File /r "src\imageformats\*.*"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\platforms"
  File "src\platforms\qwindows.dll"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\resources"
  File "src\resources\*.*"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\resources\locales"
  File /r "src\resources\locales\*.*"
  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR\styles"
  File "src\styles\qwindowsvistastyle.dll"

  SetOutPath "$INSTDIR"
  File "src\CefViewWing.exe"
  File "src\d3dcompiler_47.dll"
  File "src\chrome_elf.dll"
  File "src\icudtl.dat"
  File "src\libcef.dll"
  File "src\libEGL.dll"
  File "src\libGLESv2.dll"
  File "src\opengl32sw.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Core.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Gui.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Svg.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Widgets.dll"
  File "src\Qt5Network.dll"
  File "src\snapshot_blob.bin"
  File "src\v8_context_snapshot.bin"
  File "src\vk_swiftshader.dll"
  File "src\vk_swiftshader_icd.json"
  File "src\vulkan-1.dll"
  File "src\libcrypto-1_1-x64.dll"
  File "src\libssl-1_1-x64.dll"
SectionEnd

Section -AdditionalIcons
  ; WriteIniStr "$INSTDIR\${PRODUCT_NAME}.url" "InternetShortcut" "URL" "${PRODUCT_WEB_SITE}"
  ; CreateShortCut "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Website.lnk" "$INSTDIR\${PRODUCT_NAME}.url"
  CreateShortCut "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Uninstall.lnk" "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
SectionEnd

Section -Post
  WriteUninstaller "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
  WriteRegStr HKLM "${PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY}" "" "$INSTDIR\changxie.exe"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "DisplayName" "$(^Name)"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "UninstallString" "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "DisplayIcon" "$INSTDIR\changxie.exe"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "DisplayVersion" "${PRODUCT_VERSION}"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "URLInfoAbout" "${PRODUCT_WEB_SITE}"
  WriteRegStr ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}" "Publisher" "${PRODUCT_PUBLISHER}"
SectionEnd


Function un.onUninstSuccess
  HideWindow
  MessageBox MB_ICONINFORMATION|MB_OK "$(^Name) 已成功地从你的计算机移除。"
FunctionEnd

Function un.onInit
  MessageBox MB_ICONQUESTION|MB_YESNO|MB_DEFBUTTON2 "你确实要完全移除 $(^Name) ，其及所有的组件？" IDYES +2
  Abort
FunctionEnd

Section Uninstall
  Delete "$INSTDIR\${PRODUCT_NAME}.url"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\vulkan-1.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\vk_swiftshader_icd.json"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\vk_swiftshader.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\v8_context_snapshot.bin"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\snapshot_blob.bin"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Network.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Widgets.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Svg.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Gui.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\Qt5Core.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\opengl32sw.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libGLESv2.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libEGL.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libcef.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\icudtl.dat"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\d3dcompiler_47.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\chrome_elf.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libcrypto-1_1-x64.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\libssl-1_1-x64.dll"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\conf.json"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\CefViewWing.exe"
  Delete "$INSTDIR\changxie.exe"

  Delete "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Uninstall.lnk"
  ; Delete "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\Website.lnk"
  Delete "$DESKTOP\畅写文档.lnk"
  Delete "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档\畅写文档.lnk"

  RMDir "$SMPROGRAMS\畅写文档"
  ; 递归删除
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\Cache\"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\logs\"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\DawnCache\"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\GPUCache\"

  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\bearer"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\imageformats\"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\styles"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\resources"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\platforms"
  RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\iconengines"
  RMDir "$INSTDIR"

  DeleteRegKey ${PRODUCT_UNINST_ROOT_KEY} "${PRODUCT_UNINST_KEY}"
  DeleteRegKey HKLM "${PRODUCT_DIR_REGKEY}"
  SetAutoClose true
SectionEnd
```

需要注意的地方：
图片需要为 bmp 格式，且尺寸有要求。

## NSIS 坑



> [NSIS 用户手册](https://www.nsisfans.com/help/index.html)
